name: The Last Witch Hunter: Crafting the Magic: The Last Witch Hunter
detailed_description: Go behind the scenes of The Last Witch Hunter to see how this epic urban fantasy was brought to the big screen. Hear from global superstar, Vin Diesel, on becoming an immortal witch hunter and discover how filmmakers brought magic to life with eye-catching special effects.
